How can I participate in the decentralization and securing of the Verus blockchain and earn VRSC?

One of the best ways to participate in the decentralization and securing of the Verus blockchain is by enabling Staking in the Verus Agama wallet. This will allow you to earn VRSC while contributing to the security and decentralization of the Verus network.

e of the best ways to participate in the decentralization and securing of the Verus blockchain and you earn VRSC for it! Also, by enabling Staking in the Verus Agama wallet, mined coins can begin earning you even more Verus Coin (after shielding and unshielding them, details in Part 4).
Okay let’s begin!
Step 1
Download and unzip the portable Verus enhanced Agama for your OS at https://veruscoin.io/#download
Open Verus enhanced Agama and on the first screen, choose VRSC from the “Native mode” drop down and at the next screen, you’ll see that the chain is loading…and notice in the upper left it will say “Native”:

What is the first step to enable Staking in the Verus Agama wallet?
The first step to enable Staking in the Verus Agama wallet is to download and unzip the portable Verus enhanced Agama for your operating system from the Verus website.

What should I do after opening the Verus enhanced Agama wallet for the first time?

After opening the Verus enhanced Agama wallet for the first time, you should choose VRSC from the "Native mode" dropdown menu. Then, on the next screen, you'll see that the chain is loading, and you should notice that it says "Native" in the upper left corner.
